attributes.action: charge all MPs who have been found to abuse their expenses with fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these right honourable gentlemen have been found to be abusing their expenses, which is tax payers money, if a member of the public had carried out expenses fraud they would have been criminaly charged

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
